leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-实验合成与表征自动化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→计划→执行→记录→复现/审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: LIMS/设备接口 + 闭环平台

tools.name: emcore
tools.one_line_profile: Basic image processing library for Electron Microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing basic image processing capabilities specifically tailored for Electron Microscopy data, serving as a foundation for other tools in the 3dem ecosystem.

tools.name: RELION
tools.one_line_profile: Image-processing software for cryo-electron microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A premier software package for the refinement of macromolecular structures from cryo-electron microscopy (cryo-EM) data, widely used for single-particle analysis.

tools.name: AFMReader
tools.one_line_profile: Library for loading various atomic force microscopy file formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to read and parse data from various proprietary and standard Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) file formats, facilitating data interoperability.

tools.name: TopoStats
tools.one_line_profile: AFM image analysis program for batch processing and statistics
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for automated processing and statistical analysis of Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) images, particularly useful for tracing topographic features.

tools.name: PyJibe
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for AFM data analysis with an emphasis on biological specimens
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface tool for analyzing Atomic Force Microscopy data, specifically optimized for biological samples and force spectroscopy analysis.

tools.name: afmformats
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for reading common AFM file formats
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for reading multiple Atomic Force Microscopy file formats, providing metadata and data access in a consistent manner.

tools.name: pyfairdatatools
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to help with making data FAIR
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by the AI-READI consortium to assist researchers in making their datasets Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable (FAIR), specifically for biomedical data.

tools.name: ProjectAiAi
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source screening tool for Tuberculosis and Lung Cancer using Chest X-Rays
tools.detailed_description: An open-source CAD (Computer Aided Diagnosis) tool designed to interpret Chest X-rays for screening Tuberculosis and Lung Cancer, aiming for deployment in emerging nations.

tools.name: MIB
tools.one_line_profile: Microscopy Image Browser for multi-dimensional microscopy datasets
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based package for image processing, segmentation, and visualization of multi-dimensional (2D-4D) microscopy datasets. (Predecessor to MIB2).

tools.name: MIB2
tools.one_line_profile: Microscopy Image Browser version 2
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the Microscopy Image Browser, offering advanced tools for segmentation and visualization of electron and light microscopy datasets.

tools.name: SpectraFit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quick data-fitting based on distribution functions
tools.detailed_description: A command-line and Jupyter-compatible tool for fitting spectral data using various distribution functions, designed for materials science and chemistry applications.

tools.name: automatic-sem-image-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for Simulation and Automatic Semantic Segmentation of EM Images
tools.detailed_description: A workflow developed by BAM for simulating Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) images and training models for automatic semantic segmentation of microstructures.

tools.name: fitspy
tools.one_line_profile: Generic tool dedicated to fit spectra in python
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool developed by CEA for fitting 1D spectra (X-ray, Raman, etc.) with a graphical interface and support for various peak models.

tools.name: MaterialParser
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to compile string of chemical terms into data structure
tools.detailed_description: A utility from the Ceder Group to parse chemical strings and formulas into structured data, facilitating text mining and materials informatics.

tools.name: DataLab
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Platform for Scientific and Technical Data Processing and Visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for processing and visualizing scientific data (signals, images, spectra), offering a GUI and plugin system for extensibility.

tools.name: Photizo
tools.one_line_profile: Spectroscopy analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A package for the analysis of spectroscopic data, developed by DendrouLab, likely for biological or chemical applications.

tools.name: CHIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Cellular and Hemodynamic Image Processing Suite
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for analyzing functional images of cells and blood vessels, primarily from two-photon microscopy data.

tools.name: ANDA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated image analysis of in vitro neuronal cells
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for high-throughput automated image analysis of in vitro neuronal cells, focusing on morphology and differentiation.

tools.name: PyCorrFit
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis and fitting software for fluorescence correlation spectroscopy (FCS)
tools.detailed_description: A versatile tool for fitting and analyzing Fluorescence Correlation Spectroscopy (FCS) data, supporting various model functions and file formats.

tools.name: chisurf
tools.one_line_profile: Global analysis platform for fluorescence data
tools.detailed_description: A software platform for the global analysis of time-resolved fluorescence data, allowing for complex modeling and parameter estimation.

tools.name: hsi_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: GatorSense Hyperspectral Image Analysis Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for hyperspectral image analysis, including dimensionality reduction, target detection, and classification algorithms.

tools.name: hsi_toolkit_py
tools.one_line_profile: GatorSense Hyperspectral Image Analysis Toolkit - Python Implementation
tools.detailed_description: The Python implementation of the GatorSense Hyperspectral Image Analysis Toolkit, providing tools for processing HSI data.

tools.name: aradeepopsis
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to extract phenotypic measurements from plant images
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for high-throughput phenotyping of Arabidopsis thaliana, extracting measurements from images for genetic analysis.

tools.name: pyChemometrics
tools.one_line_profile: Objects for multivariate analysis of chemometric and metabonomic datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for chemometric analysis, including PCA, PLS-DA, and other multivariate statistical methods for chemical data.

tools.name: semantic-segmentation-editor
tools.one_line_profile: Web labeling tool for bitmap images and point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A web-based annotation tool for creating semantic segmentation datasets for images and point clouds, essential for training AI models in scientific and industrial applications.

tools.name: Cornell Spectrum Imager
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral imaging and EELS analysis tool for electron microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed for the analysis of spectral imaging data and Electron Energy Loss Spectroscopy (EELS), facilitating the extraction of chemical and physical information from microscopy datasets.

tools.name: Scipion
tools.one_line_profile: Image processing framework for 3D electron microscopy (3DEM)
tools.detailed_description: An integrative workflow platform for Cryo-Electron Microscopy (Cryo-EM) that orchestrates various software tools to obtain 3D models of macromolecular complexes.

tools.name: Xmipp
tools.one_line_profile: Image processing suite for single-particle 3D electron microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of image processing programs specialized for single-particle analysis in 3D electron microscopy, covering steps from projection matching to reconstruction.

tools.name: RSClassification
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Raman spectroscopy data analysis and classification
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework designed for the processing and classification of Raman spectroscopy data, likely supporting various machine learning models for spectral analysis.

tools.name: ImagePy
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible image processing framework compatible with Numpy and Scipy
tools.detailed_description: An open-source image processing framework written in Python, designed to be extensible via plugins (similar to ImageJ) and seamlessly integrated with the scientific Python ecosystem (Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-image).

tools.name: DeerLab
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis package for dipolar EPR spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed for the analysis of dipolar Electron Paramagnetic Resonance (EPR) spectroscopy data, providing modeling and inference tools.

tools.name: BXA
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian X-ray analysis interface for Xspec and Sherpa
tools.detailed_description: A tool that connects the nested sampling algorithm (MultiNest/UltraNest) with X-ray spectral fitting software (Xspec and Sherpa) for Bayesian model selection and parameter estimation.

tools.name: LG4X-V2
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for XPS curve fitting analysis based on lmfit
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed for X-ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS) data analysis, facilitating curve fitting and result validation using the lmfit library.

tools.name: lmfitxps
tools.one_line_profile: XPS-specific fitting models extension for lmfit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends lmfit with specialized models for X-ray Photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS), including Doniach-Sunjic lineshapes and Tougaard/Shirley backgrounds.

tools.name: FOCUS
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput electron microscopy image processing software
tools.detailed_description: A software package for connecting cryo-EM microscopes with data processing pipelines, enabling real-time monitoring and high-throughput image processing.

tools.name: LiberTEM
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance framework for pixelated STEM data processing
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for high-throughput processing of pixelated Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (STEM) data, supporting large datasets and distributed computing.

tools.name: LiberTEM-blobfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Correlation and refinement library for LiberTEM
tools.detailed_description: An extension for LiberTEM providing tools for blob finding, correlation, and refinement in electron microscopy data analysis.

tools.name: LiberTEM-holo
tools.one_line_profile: Holography reconstruction tools for LiberTEM
tools.detailed_description: A library for electron holography reconstruction and preprocessing, designed to work within the LiberTEM ecosystem.

tools.name: LiberTEM-live
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time processing extension for LiberTEM
tools.detailed_description: Enables live data processing and feedback for STEM experiments using the LiberTEM framework.

tools.name: LumiSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Luminescence data analysis extension for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library extending HyperSpy for the analysis of luminescence spectroscopy data (e.g., cathodoluminescence, photoluminescence).

tools.name: MIA
tools.one_line_profile: Microscopic Image Analyzer for particle analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing microscopic images, likely focusing on particle detection, segmentation, and statistical analysis.

tools.name: T-MIDAS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated batch processing tool for tissue microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed for the automated batch processing and analysis of tissue microscopy image data.

tools.name: napari-tmidas
tools.one_line_profile: Napari plugin for T-MIDAS batch processing
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Napari image viewer that integrates T-MIDAS functionality, enabling batch processing of microscopy data within the Napari ecosystem.

tools.name: spectramap
tools.one_line_profile: Library for hyperspectral analysis with spectroscopic focus
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for hyperspectral data analysis, emphasizing a spectroscopic approach to processing and interpretation.

tools.name: raman-fitting
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for batch processing and deconvolution of Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework specifically for the batch processing, fitting, and deconvolution of Raman spectra, with a focus on carbonaceous materials.

tools.name: Pore Space Architecture
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for 3D pore space segmentation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for the segmentation and characterization of pore spaces in particulate materials, providing 3D structural insights.

tools.name: OXSA
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for MR spectroscopy data analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for developing analysis pipelines for Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy (MRS) data, including loading, fitting, and processing functions.

tools.name: Tetracorder
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral identification and radiative transfer software
tools.detailed_description: A software system for the identification and mapping of materials using spectroscopic data, often used in planetary science and remote sensing.

tools.name: TEMUL
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis functions for high-resolution electron microscopy and spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing functions for the analysis of Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM) and Electron Energy Loss Spectroscopy (EELS) data.

tools.name: SpectroscoPyx
tools.one_line_profile: Community developed Python package for plasma spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for spectroscopy analysis, likely with a focus on plasma physics applications as part of the PlasmaPy ecosystem.

tools.name: PyXRD
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation for modeling X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns of disordered lamellar structures
tools.detailed_description: PyXRD is a Python library implementing the matrix algorithm for computer modeling of X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns, specifically designed for disordered lamellar structures. It allows researchers to simulate and analyze complex XRD data for materials characterization.

tools.name: seaborn-image
tools.one_line_profile: High-level API for attractive and descriptive image visualization in Python
tools.detailed_description: Seaborn-image is a Python library that provides a high-level API for scientific image visualization. It is built on top of matplotlib and focuses on providing descriptive and attractive visualizations for 2D image data, common in microscopy and spectroscopy.

tools.name: skultrafast
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for analyzing time-resolved spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: Skultrafast is a Python package designed for the analysis of time-resolved spectroscopy data. It provides tools for data loading, preprocessing, and advanced analysis such as global analysis and lifetime density analysis.

tools.name: Vespucci
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform software for spectroscopic data analysis and imaging
tools.detailed_description: Vespucci is a free, open-source, cross-platform application for analyzing spectroscopic data and generating chemical images. It supports various hyperspectral data formats and provides tools for univariate and multivariate analysis.

tools.name: XRDpy
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for X-Ray Diffraction (XRD) pattern visualization and crystallite size calculation
tools.detailed_description: XRDpy is a Python program designed for the quick visualization of X-Ray Diffraction (XRD) patterns. It includes functionality for calculating crystallite size using the Scherrer equation, aiding in the structural characterization of materials.

tools.name: powerxrd
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for analyzing powder X-ray diffraction data with Rietveld refinement capabilities
tools.detailed_description: powerxrd is a Python package built for the analysis of powder X-ray diffraction (XRD) data. It provides tools for data processing and is developing Rietveld refinement methods for structural analysis of materials.

tools.name: RamanSPy
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python package for integrative Raman spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: RamanSPy is a comprehensive Python package for the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data. It offers a modular framework for preprocessing, processing, and analyzing Raman spectra and hyperspectral images, facilitating integrative research.

tools.name: maskSLIC
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Simple Linear Iterative Clustering (SLIC) for Region of Interest (ROI) segmentation
tools.detailed_description: maskSLIC provides an implementation of the SLIC superpixel algorithm specifically adapted for regions of interest (ROI). This tool is useful for image segmentation tasks in scientific imaging where processing needs to be constrained to specific areas.

tools.name: DPR-Resolution_enhancement
tools.one_line_profile: Resolution enhancement algorithm using Deblurring by Pixel Reassignment (DPR)
tools.detailed_description: This repository implements the Deblurring by Pixel Reassignment (DPR) algorithm for resolution enhancement in microscopy. It is designed to improve image clarity and resolution by reassigning pixels to correct for blur, applicable in computational optics and microscopy.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: R package for chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: ChemoSpec is a collection of R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data. It includes tools for plotting spectra, performing PCA, HCA, and other exploratory data analysis techniques commonly used in spectroscopy.

tools.name: HT-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Software tools for high-throughput characterization of materials libraries
tools.detailed_description: The complete software tools for high-throughput characterization of materials libraries in experimental material science, facilitating automated data analysis.

tools.name: rampy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for processing spectroscopic data (IR, Raman, XAS)
tools.detailed_description: Python software for spectral data processing including IR, Raman, and XAS data, offering tools for baseline correction, smoothing, and peak fitting.

tools.name: Gwyddion
tools.one_line_profile: Modular software for scanning probe microscopy data visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A modular program for SPM (scanning probe microscopy) data visualization and analysis. Primarily intended for analysis of height fields obtained by scanning probe microscopy techniques (AFM, MFM, STM, SNOM/NSOM).

tools.name: PyARPES
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis framework for Angle-Resolved Photoemission Spectroscopy (ARPES)
tools.detailed_description: Open source analysis framework for Angle-Resolved Photoemission Spectroscopy (ARPES) data, providing tools for data loading, processing, and visualization.

tools.name: OCTAVVS
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for analysis and visualization of vibrational spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: Open Chemometrics Toolbox for Analysis and Visualization of Vibrational Spectroscopy data. A graphical tool for processing IR and Raman spectra.

tools.name: diffpy.pdffit2
tools.one_line_profile: Real space structure refinement to atomic Pair Distribution Function (PDF)
tools.detailed_description: A component of the DiffPy suite for real space structure refinement to atomic Pair Distribution Function (PDF).

tools.name: diffpy.pdfgui
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for real space structure refinement to PDF
tools.detailed_description: Graphical user interface for real space structure refinement to atomic Pair Distribution Function (PDF), part of the DiffPy suite.

tools.name: diffpy.srfit
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for complex modeling and atomic structure optimization
tools.detailed_description: Python framework for complex modeling and atomic structure optimization, allowing for flexible definition of refinement problems.

tools.name: diffpy.srreal
tools.one_line_profile: Library for PDF calculation and real-space utilities
tools.detailed_description: C++/Python library for Pair Distribution Function (PDF) calculation and various real-space structure analysis utilities.

tools.name: diffpy.structure
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure container and parsers
tools.detailed_description: Library providing crystal structure containers and parsers for various structure formats, used within the DiffPy ecosystem.

tools.name: diffpy.utils
tools.one_line_profile: Shared utilities for the DiffPy ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: General purpose shared utilities and helper functions used across the DiffPy suite of tools.

tools.name: libdiffpy
tools.one_line_profile: Core C++ library for DiffPy
tools.detailed_description: Underlying C++ library for calculation of PDF and other real-space quantities, serving as the computational backend for DiffPy tools.

tools.name: gpa
tools.one_line_profile: Geometrical Phase Analysis extension for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: A HyperSpy extension for performing Geometrical Phase Analysis (GPA) on microscopy images to map strain and lattice distortions.

tools.name: faim-ipa
tools.one_line_profile: Image Processing and Analysis functions for microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Image Processing and Analysis (IPA) functions used at the Facility for Advanced Imaging and Microscopy (FAIM), providing reusable tools for microscopy data.

tools.name: pyglotaran
tools.one_line_profile: Global and Target Analysis of time-resolved spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Global and Target Analysis of time-resolved spectroscopy data, enabling kinetic modeling of spectral evolution.

tools.name: napari-skimage
tools.one_line_profile: Napari plugin for scikit-image functions
tools.detailed_description: A napari plugin that provides access to various scikit-image image processing functions directly within the napari viewer.

tools.name: napari-skimage-regionprops
tools.one_line_profile: Feature extraction for labeled objects in napari
tools.detailed_description: A napari plugin for feature extraction of labeled objects (e.g., particles, grains) using regionprops from scikit-image, useful for quantitative microscopy.

tools.name: PeakFit
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based peak-fitting tool for spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A peak-fitting tool based on MATLAB for spectroscopic data analysis, allowing for deconvolution and parameter extraction from spectra.

tools.name: Symbolfit
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic parametric modeling with symbolic regression
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing symbolic regression to find mathematical expressions that best fit a given dataset. It is useful for discovering physical laws or material properties from experimental data.

tools.name: LG4X
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for XPS curve fitting analysis based on lmfit
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface developed for standard X-ray photoemission spectroscopy (XPS) curve fitting analysis. It streamlines fitting procedures, result validation, and consistency checks using the lmfit package.

tools.name: Open Potato
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis platform for functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS)
tools.detailed_description: An open platform providing transparent analysis tools for functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS) data, facilitating the processing and interpretation of hemodynamic signals.

tools.name: ExSpy
tools.one_line_profile: EDS and EELS data analysis extension for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: A HyperSpy extension dedicated to the analysis of Energy-Dispersive X-ray Spectroscopy (EDS) and Electron Energy-Loss Spectroscopy (EELS) data in electron microscopy.

tools.name: HoloSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Electron holography data analysis extension for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: A HyperSpy extension for processing and reconstructing electron holography data, enabling phase retrieval and analysis in transmission electron microscopy.

tools.name: HyperSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional data analysis library for microscopy and spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A leading open-source Python library for the analysis of multidimensional datasets, particularly suited for electron microscopy (EM) and spectroscopy data processing, visualization, and quantification.

tools.name: HyperSpyUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for the HyperSpy library
tools.detailed_description: A standalone graphical user interface wrapper for HyperSpy, allowing users to perform multidimensional data analysis without writing code.

tools.name: RosettaSciIO
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific data format I/O library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to handle reading and writing of various scientific data formats, serving as the I/O backend for the HyperSpy ecosystem.

tools.name: PSFEstimation
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially-variant CNN-based Point Spread Function estimation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for estimating spatially-variant Point Spread Functions (PSF) in optical microscopy, essential for blind deconvolution and depth estimation tasks.

tools.name: DARA
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven automated Rietveld analysis for powder XRD
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated phase search and Rietveld refinement of powder X-ray diffraction (XRD) data, utilizing data-driven approaches to streamline structural analysis.

tools.name: MultiSpec
tools.one_line_profile: Multispectral and hyperspectral image data analysis application
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive freeware application for interactively analyzing Earth observational multispectral and hyperspectral image data, widely used in remote sensing education and research.

tools.name: PySpecTools
tools.one_line_profile: Routines for rotational spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing routines and tools for the analysis of rotational spectroscopy data, including fitting and spectral prediction.

tools.name: LMFIT
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Linear Least-Squares Minimization and Curve-Fitting
tools.detailed_description: A robust Python library for non-linear least-squares minimization and curve fitting, building on scipy.optimize to provide a high-level interface for complex modeling tasks in science.

tools.name: Chemometrics
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for chemometric data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for chemometric analysis, including multivariate statistical methods often used in spectroscopy and analytical chemistry.

tools.name: NASA-gamma
tools.one_line_profile: Gamma-ray spectroscopy analysis tools with GUI
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool with a Graphical User Interface for analyzing gamma-ray spectroscopy data, facilitating peak detection and spectrum analysis.

tools.name: Pyfaidx
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient random access to FASTA subsequences
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides efficient, pythonic random access to subsequences in FASTA files, widely used in bioinformatics for genomic data processing.

tools.name: cupyimg
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated image and signal processing library for scientific data
tools.detailed_description: CuPy implementations of image and signal processing functions from NumPy, SciPy and scikit-image, enabling accelerated analysis of microscopy and spectroscopy data.

tools.name: ADDIE
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for reduction of Neutron Time-of-Flight Total Scattering Diffraction Data
tools.detailed_description: Advanced Diffraction Environment (ADDIE) is a software tool designed for the reduction and analysis of neutron diffraction data, specifically for total scattering experiments.

tools.name: lsmquant
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing and analysis of light-sheet microscopy images
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the automated processing and quantification of light-sheet microscopy data, facilitating high-throughput bioimaging analysis.

tools.name: mcmicro
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end processing pipeline for multi-channel whole-slide images
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline that transforms multi-channel whole-slide microscopy images into single-cell data, supporting segmentation and feature extraction.

tools.name: spatialvi
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing spatially-resolved gene counts and image data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for 10x Genomics Visium transcriptomics, integrating spatial coordinates with image data processing.

tools.name: eels-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Nion Swift package for Electron Energy Loss Spectroscopy (EELS) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package integrated with Nion Swift for processing and analyzing EELS data from electron microscopes.

tools.name: PulsePortraiture
tools.one_line_profile: Wideband pulsar timing code for phase and dispersion measure
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for pulsar timing analysis, capable of simultaneously measuring phase (TOA) and dispersion measure (DM) using wideband data.

tools.name: phasorpy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis of luminescence lifetime and hyperspectral images
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library implementing the phasor approach for analyzing fluorescence lifetime imaging microscopy (FLIM) and hyperspectral data.

tools.name: pytorch_radon
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Radon transform for tomography
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library providing differentiable implementations of the Radon transform, essential for tomographic reconstruction in medical and materials imaging.

tools.name: Temwizard
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Atomap TEM analysis results
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for visualizing atomic column positions and features in transmission electron microscopy images, designed to work with Atomap.

tools.name: nmrfit
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative NMR analysis through least-squares fit
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the quantitative analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectroscopy data using least-squares fitting techniques.

tools.name: sigma
tools.one_line_profile: Phase identification and spectrum analysis for EDS
tools.detailed_description: Python code for analyzing Energy Dispersive X-ray Spectroscopy (EDS) data, including phase identification and spectrum processing.

tools.name: pycroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific analysis of nanoscale materials imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing, analyzing, and visualizing multi-dimensional scientific imaging and spectroscopy data, particularly for nanoscale materials.

tools.name: kikuchipy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for analysis of electron backscatter diffraction (EBSD) patterns
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for processing and analyzing Electron Backscatter Diffraction (EBSD) patterns in scanning electron microscopy.

tools.name: pyxem
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multi-dimensional diffraction microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the analysis of multi-dimensional diffraction data, such as 4D-STEM, enabling crystallographic analysis and strain mapping.

tools.name: raman_tl
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline correction and processing of Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for preprocessing Raman spectroscopy data, including baseline correction, smoothing, and plotting functions.

tools.name: Raman-noodles
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Raman and IR spectra datasets
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for the analysis of Raman and Infrared (IR) spectroscopy datasets, facilitating material identification and characterization.

tools.name: raman-spectra-decomp-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Decomposition analysis of materials using Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: Python code designed to identify and calculate the decomposition of materials based on their Raman spectroscopy signatures.

tools.name: cuCIM
tools.one_line_profile: RAPIDS GPU-accelerated image processing library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, GPU-accelerated library for multidimensional image processing and computer vision, optimized for biomedical and scientific imaging workflows.

tools.name: Interactive-Semi-Automatic-Image-2D-Bounding-Box-Annotation-Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automatic image annotation tool using multi-template matching
tools.detailed_description: An interactive tool for rapidly creating 2D bounding box annotations for object detection datasets, utilizing multi-template matching to suggest annotations.

tools.name: scikit-image
tools.one_line_profile: A collection of algorithms for image processing in Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for image processing in Python, widely used in scientific research for analyzing microscopy, astronomy, and material science imagery. It includes algorithms for segmentation, geometric transformations, color space manipulation, analysis, filtering, morphology, and feature detection.

tools.name: MaNGA DAP
tools.one_line_profile: Data Analysis Pipeline for the SDSS-IV MaNGA survey
tools.detailed_description: The MaNGA Data Analysis Pipeline (DAP) is the survey-level software used to analyze the integral-field spectroscopy data from the Mapping Nearby Galaxies at Apache Point Observatory (MaNGA) survey. It performs spectral fitting, stellar kinematics extraction, and emission-line measurements.

tools.name: pyFAI
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Azimuthal Integration for X-ray diffraction data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reducing 2D X-ray diffraction images into 1D powder diffraction patterns (azimuthal integration). It is highly optimized for speed and used extensively in synchrotron research and materials science for crystallographic analysis.

tools.name: CubeViz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis tool for astronomical data cubes
tools.detailed_description: A visualization and analysis tool designed for integral field unit (IFU) data cubes. Built on the Glue visualization library, it allows astronomers to inspect, analyze, and visualize 3D spectral data cubes interactively.

tools.name: SpecViz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive astronomical 1D spectra analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualization and analysis of 1D astronomical spectra. It allows users to measure spectral lines, fit models, and perform basic arithmetic operations on spectral data.

tools.name: SpectroChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing and analyzing spectroscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework dedicated to the processing, analysis, and modeling of spectroscopic data (IR, NMR, Raman, etc.) for chemistry. It provides tools for data import, preprocessing, and multivariate analysis.

tools.name: SPIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Image processing system for electron microscopy
tools.detailed_description: SPIDER (System for Processing Image Data from Electron microscopy and Related fields) is a long-standing software package for single-particle reconstruction and image processing in electron microscopy.

tools.name: gwyfile
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Gwyddion file format
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python library for reading and writing files in the Gwyddion format (.gwy), which is the standard for scanning probe microscopy (SPM) data analysis.

tools.name: MATS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-spectrum Analysis Tool for Spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A software tool developed by NIST for the analysis of spectroscopic data. It supports processing and analysis of multi-spectrum datasets, aiding in material characterization.

tools.name: etspy
tools.one_line_profile: Electron Tomography tools for HyperSpy
tools.detailed_description: A HyperSpy extension package developed by NIST for processing and reconstructing electron tomography data. It provides tools for alignment, reconstruction, and visualization of tilt series data.

tools.name: grain-size-analysis-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Automated grain size measurement tools
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools from NIST for automating the segmentation of metallic grain boundaries in optical/SEM images and measuring grain sizes using intercept methods, adhering to ASTM standards.

tools.name: hyperspectralpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools and GUI for hyperspectral image analysis and material identification
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools and a Graphical User Interface (GUI) for the analysis of spectral images. It includes functionalities for target detection, Principal Component Analysis (PCA), material identification, and spectral library management, specifically tailored for hyperspectral data.

tools.name: xia2
tools.one_line_profile: Expert system for automated reduction of macromolecular crystallography data
tools.detailed_description: An automated system for the reduction of X-ray diffraction data from macromolecular crystals. It integrates with other crystallographic software (like DIALS, XDS) to process raw diffraction images into reduced data suitable for structure solution.

tools.name: mzkit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for mass spectrometry and metabolomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for processing various types of spectral data including NMR, MALDI MSI, Raman Spectroscopy, LC-MS, and GC-MS. It provides functionalities for raw data processing, chemoinformatics analysis, and data visualization.

tools.name: AutoFP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated tool for FullProf Rietveld refinement
tools.detailed_description: An automation tool designed to assist with Rietveld refinement using the FullProf suite. It employs an expert system algorithm to streamline the refinement process for X-ray diffraction data analysis.

tools.name: Larch
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis library and applications for X-ray absorption and fluorescence spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and set of applications for processing and analyzing X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy (XAS, EXAFS, XANES) and X-ray Fluorescence (XRF) data. It supports data visualization, fitting, and processing for synchrotron data analysis.

tools.name: SIDAM
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for spectroscopic imaging STM/STS in IGOR Pro
tools.detailed_description: A set of analysis tools developed for Spectroscopic Imaging Scanning Tunneling Microscopy (SI-STM) and Spectroscopy (STS). It runs within the IGOR Pro environment, facilitating the processing and visualization of multidimensional microscopy data.

tools.name: GPim
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian processes and Bayesian optimization for microscopy and hyperspectral data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library applying Gaussian Processes (GP) and Bayesian Optimization to imaging and hyperspectral data. It is designed to assist in the analysis of sparse data and automated experiments in microscopy.

tools.name: SciLink
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered agents connecting experimental materials science with modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework that utilizes Large Language Model (LLM) agents to bridge experimental materials science with computational modeling and literature analysis. It automates workflows involving data interpretation and simulation setup.
